H0.text: The Greek architect Konstantinos Apostolos Doxiadis is best remembered for designing which Asian capital city. Islamabad

H1.text: The Greek architect Konstantinos Apostolos Doxiadis is best remembered for designing which Asian capital city. Ankara

H2.text: The Greek architect Konstantinos Apostolos Doxiadis is best remembered for designing which Asian capital city. Kuala Lumpur

H3.text: The Greek architect Konstantinos Apostolos Doxiadis is best remembered for designing which Asian capital city. PK-IS

A4.text: The Greek architect Constantinos Apostolou Doxiadis developed Islamabad's master plan

A5.text: The Greek firm of architects, led by Konstantinos Apostolos Doxiadis, designed the master plan of the city based on a grid plan
